categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars drafts
Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military units

nodes.text: The Kesselian Dragoons were an Outland military group who were led by Grand Moff Tarkin. They were present at the Massassi outpost on Yavin 4 during the attack of the first Death Star.
They were in the second draft of A New Hope.
The Kessel system included Utapau in the rough draft and Ogana in the first draft.
